pkgmetadata.longdescription: Option Strategies and Valuation // Collection of tools to develop options strategies, value option contracts using the Black- Scholes-Merten option pricing model and calculate the option Greeks. Hull, John C. "Options, Futures, and Other Derivatives" (1997, ISBN:0-13-601589-1). Fischer Black, Myron Scholes (1973) "The Pricing of Options and Corporate Liabilities" doi:10.1086/260062.
